mapper.insert: insert into gift_return_commodity (gift_return_commodity_id, gift_return_id, return_num, gift_commodity_id) values (#{gift_return_commodity_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gift_return_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{return_num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gift_commodity_id,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select gift_return_commodity_id, gift_return_id, return_num, gift_commodity_id from gift_return_commodity
